document_data.name: Thabbys
document_data.occupation: High Hand in the [[Risen Cult of Bane]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Thabbys''' was a [[necromancer]] and one of seven High Hands in the [[Risen Cult of Bane]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|29-30}}<ref group="note" name="Year">[[Dragon magazine 362|''Dragon'' #362]] provides an exact date for the events of ''[[Halls of the High King]]'', which did not give an exact date within itself.
document_data.Personality: Thabbys took great delight in researching all manner of necromantic magic.
document_data.Abilities: Thabbys was to possess a wide variety of necromantic powers.<ref group="note" name="Power">The book states that a player could use the accessory ''[[Lords of Darkness (1998]]'' to detail the many powers and subservient creatures she possessed.
document_data.Possessions: Thabbys was known to be served by a number of [[bonebat]]s, which she used largely as messengers.
document_data.Relationships: Unlike some members, Thabbys's dedication to the Risen Cult of Bane was rooted solely in their ability to provide her the necessary [[material component]]s and opportunities to further her goals of becoming more adept in necromancy.
